description: {"blocks":[{"key":"bqdhp","text":"A modified version of the organic extraction protocol used in Wales et al., 2014. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cnbfq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7csvd","text":"Protocol successful at reconstructing the biodiversity of 15 kya sediment core, including a few fish species","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"4p3f4","text":"Phenol should be handled with care as it is corrosive and toxic. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"81ait","text":"Chloroform is toxic if swallowed or inhaled. warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"5re75","text":"Skin exposure to large amounts of phenol or chloroform can cause sores. Skin exposure to lesser amounts of phenol or chloroform can cause irritation. Phenol and chloroform can irritate theeyes that encounter it.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
